alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Sanpete...east central Millard and northeastern Sevier Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 240 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds over Richfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A wind gust of 58 mph was observed at 2:30 PM on I-70 at Richfield. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richfield, Salina, Annabella, Aurora, Redmond, Glenwood and Sigurd. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 34 and 70. US Route 50 between mile markers 140 and 158. US Route 89 between mile markers 226 and 233. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 16 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley
